posts.post_content:
A few Deadball Era postcards for sale. All consigned to LOTG Spring 2021 - Philadelphia Athletics 1910 elephant postcard, SGC10.

Hi Jim,
Hope you’re well.  I’ll take the dietsche street scene postcard.

Tim
Good to hear from you Tim, it is all yours.

Hey Jim,

Hope all is well with you/family.

I will take the 1912 Tigers Postcard.

Thanks,
Paul
Sold PCs removed and discounts on what is left.
